member.name: CompositingMode
member.summary: The CompositingMode enumeration specifies how rendered colors are combined with background colors. This enumeration is used by the and methods of theGraphics class.

member.name: CompositingMode.CompositingModeSourceOver
member.summary: Specifies that when a color is rendered, it is blended with the background color. The blend is determined by the alpha component of the color being rendered.

member.name: CompositingMode.CompositingModeSourceCopy
member.summary: Specifies that when a color is rendered, it overwrites the background color. This mode cannot be used along with TextRenderingHintClearTypeGridFit.
